Type.Name: EventProximity

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventProximity extends Gdk.Event

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Proximity events are generated when using GDK's wrapper for the XInput extension.

remarks.para: Proximity events are generated when using GDK's wrapper for the XInput extension. The XInput extension is an add-on for standard X that allows you to use nonstandard devices such as graphics tablets. A proximity event indicates that the stylus has moved in or out of contact with the tablet, or perhaps that the user's finger has moved in or out of contact with a touch screen.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int raw) cil managed

Docs.summary: The device where the event originated.
Docs.value: The device where the event originated.

Docs.summary: The time of the event in milliseconds.
Docs.value: The time of the event in milliseconds.
